title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, January 8, 2022
description: My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all." – Stephen Hawking, born on this day, 1942.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all." – Stephen Hawking, born on this day, 1942.
